name: The Human Connection
description:
This cinematic experience consists of both puzzle platforming and an intriguing storyline to keep you interested. You can help Bob and Mike escape the lab and save the world by putting an end to the evil robots. With over 7 levels, various cutscenes, and an amazing soundtrack, you'll be enjoying it to the end. So, do you have what it takes to save the day? Play now!

(All art, music, sound effects, gameplay, and code was created in less than 9 days by 7SevenStudios and ClawBoomGames for the Lost Relic Game Jam)
